title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Celebrating the Centennial   8 Photos  Various photographs of Big Hole National Battlefield and Bear Paw Battlefield that represent our unique parks in celebration of the NPS Centennial.          Nez Perce   7 Photos            Chief Joseph Trail Ride 2009   5 Photos              October Commemoration   7 Photos  Annual event to honor those who fell at Bear Paw Battlefield.          Plants of Bear Paw Battlefield   52 Photos  Plants and flowers of the battlefield.          Scenery   58 Photos  Scenery at Bear Paw Battlefield in every season.            Visitors   42 Photos  Visitors to Bear Paw Battlefield include school groups, tourists, and scientists.
